mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user SET email_id = #{emailId}, user_name = #{userName}, password = #{password}, date_of_birth = #{dateOfBirth}, mobile_number = #{mobileNumber}, profile_pic=#{profilePicUrl}, session_id=#{sessionId};
mapper.select: SELECT email_id, user_name, password, date_of_birth, mobile_number, profile_pic, session_id, joint_account_id, gcm_device_id, follow_count FROM user;
SELECT email_id, user_name, date_of_birth, mobile_number, profile_pic, session_id, joint_account_id, gcm_device_id, follow_count FROM user WHERE email_id=#{value};
SELECT email_id, user_name, date_of_birth, mobile_number, profile_pic FROM user WHERE email_id LIKE #{value} OR user_name LIKE #{value};
SELECT session_id FROM user WHERE email_id=#{value};
SELECT password FROM user WHERE email_id=#{value};
SELECT count(*) FROM user WHERE email_id=#{value};
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET follow_count = follow_count + 1 WHERE email_id = #{value}
UPDATE user SET follow_count = follow_count - 1 WHERE email_id = #{value}
